verses.name: Luke 2:26
verses.text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost, that he should not see death, before he had seen the Lord’s Christ.

verses.name: Luke 2:27
verses.text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple: and when the parents brought in the child Jesus, to do for him after the custom of the law,

verses.name: Luke 2:28
verses.text: Then took he him up in his arms, and blessed God, and said,

verses.name: Luke 2:29
verses.text: Lord, now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace, according to thy word:

verses.name: Luke 2:30
verses.text: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation,

verses.name: Luke 2:31
verses.text: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people;
